Saváta Hostal is located in Cartagena de Indias, 1.4 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle and 1.9 km from Steps of La Popa Mount. The property is around 2.4 km from Cartagena's Walls and 2.9 km from Bolivar Park. Cartagena's Gold Museum is 2.8 km from the property, while Palace of the Inquisition is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 2.9 km from the property. We have two double rooms, a quadruple room and a mixed dorm with 6 beds. Each room at the hostel comes with fans and a terrace.

The rooms at Saváta Hostel have a seating area. The hostel also feature a fully equipped kitchen. We speak Spanish and English. This hostel also offers the best value in Cartagena de Indias! Compared to other hostels in this city, guests get more for their money.

Situated within 1.8 km of San Felipe de Barajas Castle and 1.9 km of Steps of La Popa Mount, Saváta Hostal features rooms in Cartagena de Indias. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 2.9 km from Cartagena's Gold Museum and 2.9 km from Palace of the Inquisition.
Guests at the hostel can enjoy a vegetarian breakfast.
Cartagena's Walls is 2.5 km from Saváta Hostal, while Bolivar Park is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rafael Nunez International Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

description.description: At Saváta Hostal we have a friendly and welcoming atmosphere for our guests: it's all about good vibes and good people here at Saváta. We love to cook together and enjoy a beer on the terrace. FREE WiFii and a delicious and healthy breakfast are included. The Saváta Hostal offers a continental breakfast that is different every day. A vegetarian breakfast is available each morning. The hostel offers many popular activities, including cycling and Free Walking Tours. Wash and dry available for only 5000 Pesos per kg. It is also possible to rent bicycles in the hostel.
